name: Karen Rigamonti
what_you_do: Dr. Karen Rigamonti improves cultures. She believes that when the culture is right at an organization, the business will take care of itself and all stakeholders will be more engaged and satisfied.
who_you_serve: Individuals with disabilities, their families, and their caregivers
social_proof: Testimonials from Sarah Palmer at Johns Hopkins Aramco Healthcare, Dean L. Regan, Leslie P., and Ghada Al-Habib at Johns Hopkins Aramco Healthcare
